label: additionalDescription
comment: An additional textual description for this trade product.
The description, expressed as text, of additional information supplied to enable the matching of an entry with the items that the payment is intended to settle.

domainIncludes.comment: The information that enables the reconciliation of a payment with the item(s) that the payment is intended to settle, for example a commercial invoice.
Any tangible output or service produced by human or mechanical effort or by a natural process.
